dc:title: On Pilgrimage - Pilgrimage to Mexico Part II
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: On a sleepless stormy night, she shares her worry over their coming eviction from Christie Street. Tells the story of Lawrence Blum whom she visited in Mexico, how he found his vocation on a pilgrimage in Mexico, and his work as an example of a family man living a life of sanctity in the world. Keywords: Church
